channel.title: Game Development on Shengting Cao's Note Book
channel.description: Recent content in Game Development on Shengting Cao's Note Book

item.title: Unreal Zombie Game Development I
item.description: First I will list some resource website I got from the internet: Unreal Engine Official Tutorial Site Need account to access. Mixamo This is the website I got my 3D character and animation, you can upload your own model to get it animated. This blog is going to illustrate the logic for the game, for other animation or project setup will be described in next blog. Create a character First go to create a project using C++ without any start content.
